title: 1.10.2服务端不知道什么原因导致的崩溃，希望有能力的技术帮个忙解决下。
author: 小神无限
txt_content:
服务器开启后只要有玩家往出生点东边跑过去就会崩服，具体原因不明，去往东边后服务端也会报[Server thread/WARN]: Can't keep up! Did the system time change, or is the server overloaded? Running 2267ms behind, skipping 45 tick(s)这类报警，随即崩服。希望帮忙解决这个难题，困扰了许久，再次感谢坛友。







logs.rar


2017-3-9 00:04 上传
点击文件名下载附件




370.12 KB, 下载次数: 7


崩溃日志

replies.author: yuudachi
replies.txt_content:
看了一下fml-server-1.log文件，对以下内容做了一下个人看法，仅供参考：

33行[23:36:28] [main/WARN] [FML/]: The coremod codechicken.lib.asm.CCLCorePlugin does not have a MCVersion annotation, it may cause issues with this version of Minecraft复制代码你的NEI核心文件codechicken可能有问题，重新去官网获取一个替换一下看看

52行[23:36:28] [main/WARN] [FML/]: The coremod ic2.core.coremod.IC2core does not have a MCVersion annotation, it may cause issues with this version of Minecraft复制代码IC2 MOD也可能有问题，个人建议解决方式同上

67行[23:36:28] [main/WARN] [FML/]: The coremod toughasnails.asm.TANLoadingPlugin does not have a MCVersion annotation, it may cause issues with this version of Minecraft复制代码TAN模组也有问题，个人建议解决方式同上

86行[23:36:28] [main/WARN] [mixin/]: Mixin config mixins.common.core.optional.json requires mixin subsystem version 0.6.8 but 0.6.6 was found. The mixin config will not be applied.复制代码应该来自spongeforge，建议更新到最新版（5.2.0-BETA-2223）

当然还有其他的警告信息我暂时不好给出处理建议。

replies.author: aiwdsj
replies.txt_content:
这种错误关注一下看看：
[23:18:43] [main/ERROR] [ToughAsNails Transformer/]: Unexpected hash 20f2d689046ef2bce53aff9618487c56 detected for class BlockCrops. Crashes or bugs may occur!复制代码
例如先停掉ToughAsNails模组

replies.author: 小神无限
replies.txt_content:
yuudachi 发表于 2017-3-9 08:31
看了一下fml-server-1.log文件，对以下内容做了一下个人看法，仅供参考：

33行你的NEI核心文件codechicken ...
非常感谢，我会去尝试的

replies.author: 陈——创
replies.txt_content: mod出错了吧，还有，楼主头像是武士桑吗......
